@graph.caption: Our Vegan Cookie Dough Bites on a white plate

@graph.name: Vegan Cookie Dough Bites - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: 7 Ingredient Vegan Cookie Dough Bites! These chocolate chip cookie dough balls have no grain, gluten and no added oil. Vegan Gluten-free Grain-free Recipe Paleo

@graph.name: Vegan Cookie Dough Bites (No Bake Gluten-free)
@graph.description: 7 Ingredient Vegan Cookie Dough Bites! These chocolate chip cookie dough balls have no grain, gluten and no added oil. Can be made without the sugar. Vegan Paleo Gluten-free Grain-free Recipe.Â
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp brown sugar for sweeter and texture (, optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Process cashews, coconut and salt until fine even meal. Process for 2-3 minutes so the cashews break down well and start to get buttery.
recipeInstructions.name: Process cashews, coconut and salt until fine even meal. Process for 2-3 minutes so the cashews break down well and start to get buttery.

recipeInstructions.text: Add dates, sugar, vanilla and process until dates have broken down evenly. Depending on the dates, this may take 1-2 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add dates, sugar, vanilla and process until dates have broken down evenly. Depending on the dates, this may take 1-2 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Add almond flour and process until the mixture is fat doughy crumbs or somewhat doughy. Transfer to a bowl, add chocolate chips and mix
recipeInstructions.name: Add almond flour and process until the mixture is fat doughy crumbs or somewhat doughy. Transfer to a bowl, add chocolate chips and mix

recipeInstructions.text: Use a scoop or hands to shape into balls. If the dates were dry, add sprinkles of oil or non dairy milk/water and mix in. Then press between your hands to check if a ball forms. Then use scoop to make scoops or roll between your hands.Store: On the counter for 2 days, refrigerated for upto 2 weeks.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a scoop or hands to shape into balls. If the dates were dry, add sprinkles of oil or non dairy milk/water and mix in. Then press between your hands to check if a ball forms. Then use scoop to make scoops or roll between your hands.Store: On the counter for 2 days, refrigerated for upto 2 weeks.

@graph.keywords: no bake cookie doughbites, paleo cookie dough bites, vegan cookie dough balls
